1.0.0.en: Initial version with support for NEO Coolcam smartplug 2000W

1.0.1.en: Added support for NEO Coolcam smartplug 3600W & You can now use IP instead of ID to connect devices

1.0.2.en: Added check on ID or IP and key when adding device.

1.0.3.en: Added support for LSC Smart LED light Strip (action) and LSC smart power plug (action) & Optimized data processing from devices

1.0.4.en: Optimized and centralized code. & Updated TuyAPI to version 5.1.3

1.0.5.en: Fixed crash because dataobject was invalid / undefined.

1.0.6.en: Added support for LSC Smart Filement LED (action)

1.0.7.en: Fixed icon of LSC Smart Filement LED (action) & Added logging for data atribute

1.0.8.en: Added support for AOFO WiFi Smart Power Strip

1.0.9.en: Fixed small bug controlling socket 4 off AOFOWiFiSmartPowerStrip & Added flowcharts for individual sockets 1 t/m 4 and usb ports

1.1.0.en: Version 3.0.0 support & Implemented energy propertyâ€™s & Formatted the code

1.1.1.en: Added support for Anccy shutter timer switch (shutterdevice)

1.1.4.en: It is now possible to specify what version of the tuya protocol you want to use (default remains 3.1)

1.1.6.en: releasenote change and added old notes to change json
